title: INDEX_OF_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of substring within string(case-insensitive). Optionally starts searching from index_optional. Returns -1 if not found.

parameters.name: index_optional
parameters.description: The starting index for the search (zero-based). Defaults to 0.

examples:
INDEX_OF_IGNORE_CASE("Report.Q1.Final.PDF", ".pdf", 10)
-- Returns 15. Finds the first occurrence of ".pdf" starting from index 10 (case-insensitive).
